description: Number of symmetric 4 X 4 matrices of nonnegative integers with every row and column adding to n.
references: Carlitz, L. Enumeration of symmetric arrays. Duke Math. J. 33 1966 771--782. MR0201332 (34 #1216).
R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Wadsworth, Vol. 1, 1986; see Prop. 4.6.21, p. 235, G_4(lambda).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,-14,14,0,-14,14,-6,1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 15 2000; definition revised Jul 06 2014
